Dessert.name: Apple Pie
Dessert.desc: One (1) slice of cinnamon apple pie with a crispy crust.

Dessert.name: Lemon Meringue Pie
Dessert.desc: One (1) slice of lemon meringue pie with a creamy texture.

Dessert.name: Pecan Pie
Dessert.desc: One (1) slice of pecan pie with a sweet, maple filling.

Dessert.name: Ice Cream
Dessert.desc: Two (2) scoops of your choice of vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry ice cream, topped with whipped cream and a cherry.

Dessert.name: Milkshake
Dessert.desc: Eight (8) oz. milkshake with your choice of vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry flavor.
